workflow.name: clvm
workflow.longdesc:
Configure a cloned instance of cLVM and one volume group.
NB: You need just one clvm, regardless of how many volume groups. In other words, you can use this wizard only for one volume group and to make another one, you'll have to edit the resulting configuration yourself.

parameters.stepdesc: The ID specified here is for the volume group cluster resource.

parameter.name: id
parameter.longdesc: Unique ID for the volume group in the cluster.

workflow.crm_script:
primitive ocf:heartbeat:LVM params volgrpname="" op start timeout=60s op stop timeout=60s op monitor interval=30s timeout=60s
primitive dlm ocf:pacemaker:controld op start timeout=90s op stop timeout=100s
primitive clvm ocf:lvm2:clvmd params daemon_timeout="30" op start timeout=90s op stop timeout=100s
group g- dlm clvm
clone c- g- meta interleave="true" ordered="true"
